name: Car Rental System
description: A full-featured car rental platform where users can register, log in, add their own cars for rent, manage bookings, and explore available vehicles with powerful filtering and sorting options.
feature: Car Management: Add, update, delete, and date modify your listed cars.
Switch between grid and list views for car listings.
Car Booking:  Users can book cars, update booking dates, or cancel.
Car Booking: Users can book cars, update booking dates, or cancel.
Search cars, sort by price (low-high / high-low)
Switch between grid and list views for car listings.
Private routes for dashboard sections like Add Car, My Car, My Booking.
Framer Motion Animation: Smooth page transitions and animations.
Swiper Slider Integration: Interactive image sliders for featured cars.

name: Foodie's Hub
description: Foodie Hub is a full-stack recipe management and sharing platform where users can add, update, delete, and browse recipes. It features a dynamic dashboard with real-time data visualizations via Recharts, user-specific recipe management, and secure authentication using Firebase.
feature: Create / Read / Update / Delete (CRUD) for recipes
Browse all recipes with server-side pagination
Browse all recipes with server-side pagination
Add New Recipe from the dashboard with form validation
SweetAlert2 for confirmation dialogs and alerts

name: DailyMart
description: DailyMart is a complete e-commerce solution where users can register, login, browse products, add items to cart or wishlist, and securely make payments. It features a dynamic user dashboard and modern UI/UX.
feature: Entire app state managed using React Redux Toolkit
